allow:
Bash(claude -p --output-format json --no-session-persistence "Analyze this task and determine if it needs human approval. Return ONLY valid JSON, nothing else.

Task: Your build is ready! Here''s how to submit it to TestFlight

This is an informational email from Expo about a completed build. It provides instructions for submitting to TestFlight using EAS Submit.

IMPORTANT: Respond with ONLY this JSON structure:
{
  ""decision"": ""APPROVE"",
  ""target_folder"": ""Done"",
  ""analysis"": ""Brief analysis""
}

Rules:
- If informational, set decision=APPROVE and target_folder=Done
- If requires action/money, set decision=NEEDS_APPROVAL and target_folder=Pending_Approval")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: clean up old tasks and fix unicode errors

- Archive 118 old tasks \(Jan 17-27\) to Done folder
- Keep only 25 recent tasks \(Jan 28-30\) for processing
- Fix unicode emoji error in spotify_client.py for Windows console compatibility
- Orchestrator tested and working in dry-run mode

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
